sentence.Network_en: Those familiar with Sanders call him a consummate politician.
sentence.Network_cn: 那些熟悉桑德斯的人都称他为手段高明的政治家。

sentence.Network_en: He acted the part with consummate skill.
sentence.Network_cn: 他以精湛的演技饰演了这一角色。
她是个技艺非凡的表演者。

list.abs: 完美的爱(Consummate love)：同时具备三要素。半途效应公共拖鞋”效应巴霖效应安慰剂效应暗示效应性格测试：你最好的人生角 …
⑦完美式爱情(consummate love):激情,承诺和亲密俱有.与Sternber的观点相似,Lasswell,Robsenz(1980)通过研究找出了六种形式的爱 …

Character  - Chinese... ... 绝迹[ vanish; be stamped out] 绝技[ unique skill;consummate skill] 绝经[ menopause].
中共国网络敏感词库（三） - 世界中文论坛 ... 法轮( Falun) 圆满( consummation) 李洪志( Li Hongzhi).

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (as an adjective in the sense 'completed, accomplished'): from Latin consummat- 'brought to completion', from the verb consummare, from con- 'altogether' + summa 'sum total', feminine of summus 'highest, supreme'

encyclopedia.content: 品牌经历 CONSUMMATE创建于2008年，三年来“让世人因CONSUMMATE而充满魅力”一直被视为企业愿景和历史使命，指引着整个团队全心投入发掘中国现代女性内心的审美情趣，展现出女性优雅、知性、时尚的精致生活。 经过短短几年的国际化品牌运作，已成为中国成熟女装行业的知名品牌，在业内及消费群体中拥有很好的口碑和强大的品牌号召力，在未来的几年中，CONSUMMATE在保持现有品牌市场竞争优势的同时，将从国外引进或自主研发更多高

entry.tran: 造诣极高的;技艺精湛的;炉火纯青的
entry.def: You use consummate to describe someone who is extremely skilful.

example.ex: He acted the part with consummate skill...
example.tran: 他以精湛的演技饰演了这一角色。

example.ex: Those familiar with Sanders call him a consummate politician.
example.tran: 那些熟悉桑德斯的人都称他为手段高明的政治家。

entry.tran: 圆房;通过性交使(婚姻或两人关系)圆满
entry.def: If two people consummate a marriage or relationship, they make it complete by having sex.

example.ex: They consummated their passion only after many hesitations and delays.
example.tran: 他们几经踌躇和拖延后才尽情宣泄了激情。

entry.def: To consummate an agreement means to complete it.

example.ex: There have been several close calls, but no one has been able to consummate a deal.
example.tran: 有好几次死里逃生，却没有人做成一笔交易。

means.word_mean: 1. having or revealing supreme mastery or skill;
2. perfect and complete in every respect; having all necessary qualities;
3. without qualification; used informally as (often pejorative) intensifiers;

auth_sentence.content: Not surprisingly, Mr. Caro is a consummate storyteller.
auth_sentence.res_content: Not surprisingly, Mr. Caro is a consummate storyteller.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Not surprisingly, Mr. Caro is a consummate storyteller.

auth_sentence.content: His mechanisms are not those of a consummate politician.
auth_sentence.res_content: His mechanisms are not those of a consummate politician.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His mechanisms are not those of a consummate politician.

auth_sentence.content: Mr. Chertoff praised Mr. Paulison as consummate team player.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mr. Chertoff praised Mr. Paulison as consummate team player.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mr. Chertoff praised Mr. Paulison as consummate team player.

stems_affixes.word_buile: con全部+sum总,加+mate→全部总和→完成的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 总数,和;金额;算术题;要旨
stems_affixes.word_buile: sum总,加→n.总数,和;金额;算术题;要旨 v.合计,总计
re再,加强+sum总,加+e→再总计→摘要, 概略, 简历
con全部+sum总,加+mate→全部总和→完成的
sum总,加→n.总数,和;金额;算术题;要旨 v.合计,总计

sentences.en: We consummated an agreement after a year of negotiation.
sentences.cn: 经过一年的谈判, 我们达成了协议。
